meanings.definition: To dissect or analyze in detail
meanings.sent1: The scientist carefully anatomizes the frog to understand its internal organs.
meanings.sent2: She anatomizes the data to find patterns and trends.
meanings.sent3: The curious student anatomizes the sandwich to see all its layers.
meanings.sent4: His keen eye anatomizes the painting, revealing hidden symbols and meanings.
meanings.sent5: The detective anatomizes the crime scene, piecing together clues to solve the mystery.

meanings.definition: To examine or study the structure of something closely
meanings.sent1: The engineer anatomizes the bridge to ensure its stability.
meanings.sent2: She anatomizes the map to understand the geographical features.
meanings.sent3: The child anatomizes the toy robot, trying to figure out how it works.
meanings.sent4: Her mind anatomizes the poem, unraveling its complex metaphors.
meanings.sent5: The artist anatomizes the flower, capturing every detail in the painting.
